Class Mask

java.lang.Object
Mask
public class Mask extends Object
Represents class to store in matrix gray colors. 20.12.2023
Author:
Vitalii Reshetnyk

    • setPixel

      public void setPixel(int x, int y, int value)
      Set the value of a specific pixel in the mask.
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of the pixel.
      y - Y-coordinate of the pixel.
      value - Value to set for the pixel (0 or 1).
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the pixel coordinates are invalid.

    • getPixel

      public int getPixel(int x, int y)
      Get the value of a specific pixel in the mask.
      Parameters:
      x - X-coordinate of the pixel.
      y - Y-coordinate of the pixel.
      Returns:
      Value of the specified pixel.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the pixel coordinates are invalid.
